get.summary: Get Default or Empty Cart or Cart associated with current token
get.description: Get Default or Empty Cart or Cart associated with current token

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format (default is application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable. Currently only application/json is supported

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel identifier. NA is treated as default.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Consuming Application identifier. NA is treated as default. More values will be added to swagger as clients are onboarded.

parameters.name: interactionId
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: creditLevel
parameters.description: CreditLevel selected for the customer. It represents one of the  credit levels GOOD, BUILDING and NONE.

get.summary: Get Optiponal Services (ex. JUMP, Raphsody etc.)
get.description: Get available optional services for a line. The services are dependent on Device, Rate Plan, any other selected optional services (line level or cart level) and zipCode combination. Hence the services are in the context of the Line.

post.summary: Update selected Optional Services to the specified line in the Cart
post.description: Update Optional Services for the line in the cart. The body contains the Id of the Service Bundle which is a hash of the set of selected services. The Commerce Engine takes care of adding/removing services from the Line in the Cart.

parameters.name: storeId

parameters.description: Cart ID

parameters.name: lineId
parameters.description: Line of service id

post.summary: This API provides ability to clone a specified cart
post.description: This operation clones a cart and replaces the cart associated with the current API Token with the cloned cart. The original cart is not impacted in this process. Upon successful clone, the new cart Id is returned in the response (and is also available via default cart call). Use the GET /carts call to get the contents of the newly created cart. NOTE - This operation is a long running operation with time as linearly proportionate to the contents of the original cart and is ideally intented to be called in an async manner. API consumers should consider performance implications while consumeing this in real time.

get.summary: Find carts in the cart registry
get.description: This operation finds carts in the cart registry using specified criteria. Cart Registry is a collection of references to carts which is used to drive lookup. Criteria includes one of phone number, email or cartid all of which are specified as query parameters.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel identifier. NA is treated as default.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Consuming Application identifier. NA is treated as default. More values will be added to swagger as clients are onboarded.

parameters.name: interactionId
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: follow
parameters.description: Cart ID

parameters.name: cartID
parameters.description: Unique Id of the Cart to be looked up in the registry

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number to use as criteria to search the cart registry for carts

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to use as criteria to search the cart registry for carts

200.description: Array of matching results found in the registry

post.summary: Save carts in the cart registry
post.description: This operation saves carts in the cart registry using specified key. Key includes one of phone number, email or cartid. Note that the contents of the cart are not saved in registry only the pointer to the cart.

parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: follow
parameters.description: Cart ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The post body which contians the cart id and key to save

201.description: Cart was successfully saved in the registry

delete.summary: remove cart in the cart registry
delete.description: This operation removes cart from the cart registry using specified key. All carts matching the given key will be purged with this operation.

parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel identifier. NA is treated as default.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Consuming Application identifier. NA is treated as default. More values will be added to swagger as clients are onboarded.

parameters.name: interactionId
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: cartID
parameters.description: Cart ID

post.summary: This is the API to trigger quotation where taxes and fees are computed in the backend. It is required where explicit quoations needs to be run.
post.description: This is the API to trigger quotation where taxes and fees are computed in the backend. It is required where explicit quoations needs to be run.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: API version.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel identifier. NA is treated as default.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Consuming Application identifier. NA is treated as default. More values will be added to swagger as clients are onboarded.

parameters.name: interactionId
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: cartID
parameters.description: Cart ID

financeType.description: Financial type could be one of loan or lease. Loan equates programs like EIP and lease equates programs like JOD

agreementId.description: This represents the agreement id corresponding to the finance agreement.

payOffAmount.description: This is the payoff value determined by the financial system

tradeInPrice.description: trade in value of the device

disposition.description: dispostion from the user. ACCEPT or ACCEPT DEFERRED

deviceMake.description: Manufacturer of the trade in device

deviceModel.description: Model of the trade in device

deviceCarrier.description: Current carrier of the device being traded in

deviceIMEI.description: IMEI of the device being traded in

quoteId.description: Tradein Quote id from the financial system

tradeInType.description: It is for type of the trade-in.

deviceCondition.description: It is used to define the Tradein device condition.

suppressFMV.description: Flag whether to suppress fair market value

quantity.description: no. of accessory to be added

audit-time.description: Time when audit record is captured. It is not required in add/update audit record API.

audit-ip.description: IP of the client from where audit record is captured.

cartId.description: Cart id of the registered cart

zipcode.description: zip code for the registered cart

phonenumber.description: Phone number used while registering the cart

email.description: email address used while registering the cart

apiToken.description: API Token to access the cart. This is a bearer token

apiLocation.description: resource location to find the details of the cart

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the cart is saved

accessoriesEipEligible.description: If true then,the accessory is eligible for EIP

extCartId.description: This is extended Cart id in checkout mode which links data like shipping and payments to the cart.

accessoriesTotal.description: Total cost of the all accessories in a cart

devices.description: list of standalone devices in cart outside of line context

tradeInId.description: Commerce platform specific Trade-id which is used in update/delete trade-ins API.

tradeInPrice.description: trade in value of the device

disposition.description: dispostion from the user. ACCEPT or ACCEPT DEFERRED

deviceMake.description: Manufacturer of the trade in device

deviceModel.description: Model of the trade in device

deviceCarrier.description: Current carrier of the device being traded in

deviceIMEI.description: IMEI of the device being traded in

quoteId.description: Tradein Quote id from the financial system

tradeInType.description: It is for type of the trade-in.

deviceCondition.description: It is used to define the Tradein device condition.

suppressFMV.description: Flag whether to suppress fair market value

agreementId.description: Agreement ID against which the balance is being charged.

subType.description: Line type - it can be either HANSET / TABLET

lineType.description: Line type - it can be either HANDSET / TABLET

transactionCode.description: Line level status code indicating the transaction type in cart. This is used to enforce business logic & drive backend processing. Clients are expected to set this when creating a line.

lineName.description: Friendly name assigned by the API consumers. ex. John's Line

lineNumber.description: Line Number is the decimal numbering for line used to drive display sequencing.

phoneNumber.description: phoneNumber is the mobile number associated with existing line

planOptionSelectorId.description: Id of the plan to be selected

userMessage.description: Friendly message contextual to the API operation.

id.description: Line ID is the encoded system-generated id

lineNumber.description: Line No is the decimal numbering for line used to drive display sequencing.

lineType.description: Line type indicates if line is voice or data.

lineName.description: Friendly name assigned by the API consumer. ex. John's line

transactionCode.description: Line level status code indicating the transaction type in cart. This is used to enforce business logic & drive backend processing. Clients are expected to set this when creating a line.

allowedMaxLines.description: It is maximum number of lines allowed for the cart.

tradeIn.description: Trade in device details. This is applicable when old device is being traded in.

financePayoff.description: Pending balance due on the line. this is applicable for device upgrades.

pageCount.description: Total pages based on per page record count

plan.description: Details of plan added to line

contractTerm.description: Contract term for the monthly payments. It is only for Monthly pricing.

priceSummary.description: Due today and Due monthly price amounts

creditPrice.description: Promotional/appeasement credit price offered to the transaction

subTotal.description: Cart Subtotal presented as Due Today/Due Monthly which includes sum of line item prices, adjusted for deposits and discounts

total.description: Sum of SubTotal plus Taxes and Shipping

cartItem.description: Represents item details in the cart

id.description: Id of the item. It can be lineId/Device Id/Service Id/accessory Id/plan Id

enabled.description: This boolean value indicates if the offer is available for selection (in context of services). In case if there is any conflict between the services then it will be false for the respective service.

selected.description: This flag indicates if the service is selected or not. It is also in the context of services.

actionCode.description: This code indicates the status for the cart item in the context of the transaction. e.g. REMOVE status indicates that the item was an existing service which is being removed as part of the current transaction.

availableFromDate.description: The availability start date for the product if it is currently not available.

availableToDate.description: The availability end date for the product if it is currently not available.

selectedPricingOption.description: It is used to specify the price type selected for the devices or accessories.

color.description: Selected Color of the offer variant

memory.description: Selected Memory Capacity for the offer variant

clubTier.description: The device tier for club  pricing

taxInclusive.description: Identifies if the tax is included in the pricing

imageURL.description: Relative URL for the item Image

offerSubType.description: The product subtype such as Handset/Tablet/Simcard

offerType.description: Type of the product, It can be either Device/Accessory

extCartId.description: This is extended Cart id in checkout mode which links data like shipping and payments to the cart.

priceSummary.description: Due today and Due monthly prices

planconfigurationsID.description: Plan config Id of the cart

quantity.description: Number of accessory to be added
qty of the device to be updated

itemId.description: Item code of the service which needs to be selected.

skuId.description: Item Id of the product offer

code.description: Code for the payment option like MSCD for master card, DISC for Discover etc.

displayName.description: Friendly name for the payment option.

type.description: Payment type like Credit, Debit, Cash etc.

paymentMethod.description: It is field which is used to specify the payment method for the payments.

cardNumber.description: Card number for the payment. It is used to capture the card number in case of submit payment details API only. It is blank in case of get payment details API response.

cardNumberAlias.description: Alias Card number for the payment. It is tokenized card number generated for the card number of the customer by payment gateway.

cardHolderName.description: Card holder name for the payment.

maskedCardNumber.description: Masked Card number for the payment. It returns the last 4 digit of the card number in the format like xxxxxxxxxxxx1111. It is not required for Submit payment details call.

cardTypeIndicator.description: Indicator for the card type. Some backend processing systems need this.

expirationMonth.description: Expiry month for the payment type used of the order.

expirationYear.description: Expiry year for the payment type used of the orde

macAddress.description: Mac address of the customer from where payment details are provided.

storePaymentMethodIndicator.description: Indicator to show that payment method is stored.

settlementIndicator.description: Indicator for the settlement of the payment transaction.

extCartId.description: This is extended Cart id in checkout mode which links data like shipping and payments to the cart. This is required field for adding payment details.

shipmentDetailsId.description: Commerce platform specifc shipment detail id. It is unique ID created for each shipment detail. It is part of get shipping option details response.

optionsId.description: Commerce platform specific ID. It is unique id specific to each Shipment option. It is part of get shipping option details response. If it is not passed in the request then best available shipping option will be set as default. Best available shipping option is always the fastest in delivery and with the cheapest price.

extCartId.description: This is extended Cart id in checkout mode which links data like shipping and payments to the cart. This is required field for selecting shipping option.

displayName.description: Friendly name for the shipping option.

selected.description: It tells which shipping option is selected from the list of available shipping option.

shipmentDetailsId.description: Commerce platform specifc shipment detail id. It is unique ID created for each shipment detail.

optionsId.description: Commerce platform specific ID. It is unique id specific to each Shipment option.
